text: Água e Vinho is an album by Brazilian guitarist Egberto Gismonti that was released in 1972. The album contains the songs "Água e Vinho" and "Ano Zero" with lyrics by Geraldo E. Carneiro. These became two of his most popular songs. ==Track listing== ==Personnel== * Egberto Gismonti – guitar, piano, vocals * Novelli – bass * João Palma – drums ==References== ==External links== * Gismonti at AllMusic * Oldies.com Category:1972 albums Category:Egberto Gismonti albums
title: Água e Vinho
